hero.description: Standard card: Absolute order, a soldier must devote his life to his General.

cards.name: Winterfell
cards.description: Premium card: All is white. My mouth is frozen and I must scream.
Standard card: When he is near, close your eyes. They betray your mind.
cards.name: Miraj

cards.description: Premium card: His presence is not known even by ghosts, success at all costs.
cards.name: Sentinel

cards.description: Premium card: The will of Gods has been spoken, obey and you shall be saved...or not.

Winterfell
cards.description: Standard card: The days are cold and so are we. We hope we can close our eyes again.
Standard card: He has seen everything, his mind has never been asleep since the making of the realm.

cards.description: Standard card: A drink can always be served, with the blood of his enemies.
